word_mean: 套针：带套管的锐端器材，用于体腔壁的穿刺吸液

sentence.Network_en: An instrument called a trocar makes a puncture in the abdominal wall.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种叫做套管针的工具在腹壁上刺了一个孔。

sentence.Network_en: Connect the Luer lock to the trocar port on side.
sentence.Network_cn: 在病者傍边把针头锁接与套管针端口连接上.

sentence.Network_en: To study the sealing up method of intravenous trocar.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨静脉留置套管针封管方法.

局麻下经胸腔穿刺套管(Trocar)插入胸腔镜，钳取数块送病理学检查。清理胸膜腔：直视下用操作钳分离粘连带，钳取或负压吸出纤维 …
以便套管穿刺针(trocar)穿刺进入腹腔时“远”离大血管。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French trocart, trois-quarts, from trois 'three' + carre 'side, face of an instrument'
